title: How to Make an Origami Stop Sign

steps.headline: Take a square piece of paper.
steps.description: Make sure the color side is down.

steps.headline: Fold the paper in half diagonally both ways.
steps.description: there should now be and "X" shape created on the paper. These folds will serve as a guide.

steps.headline: Fold each of the four corners in.
steps.description: Make sure that the crease on the corner aligns with the crease on the paper. Note: The folds may not be completely accurate (as in making the polygon regular), so you could use a ruler as well.

steps.headline: Flip the paper over.
steps.description: You should now have an octagon.

steps.headline: Add some decorations, or just in big, bold letters, the classic, "STOP."

text: Take a square piece of paper. Make sure the color side is down. Fold the paper in half diagonally both ways. there should now be and "X" shape created on the paper. These folds will serve as a guide. Fold each of the four corners in. Make sure that the crease on the corner aligns with the crease on the paper. Note: The folds may not be completely accurate (as in making the polygon regular), so you could use a ruler as well. Flip the paper over. You should now have an octagon. Add some decorations, or just in big, bold letters, the classic, "STOP."  Finished.
